'''Heated Battle Mode: The Profound Purpose of Practice''' is an [[Event]] for [[Genius Invokation TCG]] in [[Version 3.5]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* 2023/03/11 10:00:00 – 2023/03/20 03:59:59

===Requirements===
* [[Adventure Rank]] 32 or above
* Complete the Archon Quest "[[Song of the Dragon and Freedom]]"
* Complete the World Quest "[[Battlefield of Dice, Cats, and Cards]]"

===Summary===
* After the event starts, Travelers can go to the Invitation Board of The Cat's Tail to participate in "Genius Invokation TCG" duels under the special rules of "Heated Battle Mode."
* The special rule for this edition is: <section begin="special_rule" />The first Action Card played each Round will cost 2 fewer dice. The first Skill or Equipped Talent for every character each Round will cost 1 fewer die.<section end="special_rule" />
* Travelers can invite teammates or participate in duels via match-making after reaching Player Level 4.
